ingredients: 1 cup all purpose plus more for dusting
instructions: Using the small bowl, add the 1/2 cup lukewarm water, yeast, sugar, and butter. Mix together with a fork.
Dump the contents of the small bowl into the bowl of the stand mixer.
Add these to the stand mixer bowl: pumpkin powder, 1 cup water, bread flour, and all-purpose flour.
Turn on the stand mixer and allow it to knead the dough for a few minutes or until it clings to the hook and cleans the sides of the bowl.
Remove the dough and flatten into a pizza-like circle shape with a rolling pin.
With the other small bowl, add the monkfruit (or sugar), cinnamon, cocoa powder, pecans & walnuts, and butter. Mix Together with a fork.
Using the fork, apply the contents of the bowl to the dough.  Spread it all around on the top.
Take one end of the dough and start rolling it until you get to the other end of the dough.  The dough should look like a the shape of snake.
With the food scrapper/chopper, cut approximately 15 pieces.

Remove the individual chopped up pieces and place in a cooking pan (preferably a cast iron pan).  Place them so that you can see the swirls looking down at them.  (So you'll flip them 90 degrees from the position they were at when you chopped them up).
Bake at 350 degrees F for 20-25 min.

description.description: Cinnamon pumpkin rolls recipe using stand mixer.
